info.title: IT Wallet API - OpenID Connect Relying Party
info.description: API for the Italian EUDI Wallet implementation profile (version: '0.6.0') https://italia.github.io/eudi-wallet-it-docs/v0.6.0/en/

get.summary: The RP OIDC endpoint for requesting a user login to a specific OpenID Provider (OP)

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Contains the unique application session identifier at the Wallet Instance side

parameters.name: idphint
parameters.description: The identifier of the hinted OpenID Provider (OP), in URL-encoded format

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Redirection URI of the RP, in URL-encoded format, to which the RP /redirect_uri Service redirects the Wallet Instance with the verified RP user_session

302.description:
Found

No content

BINDING HTTP-REDIRECT

=> EXAMPLE Location Header:

https://oidp.example.org/authorize?scope=openid&code_challenge=3Lbh2R_fNV-xGcXEP_Kjm_VZyYoCCY9WomfhKTlDoAuuotmD1ePUZA&code_challenge_method=S256&request=eyJ0eXAiOiJqd3QiLCJhbGciOiJFUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6ImVOTi1nNWk2Q25MS2NsdFFCcDZhYmJpb0dNYnpNNm11VzN2dXh3NnVoODgifQ..ba_xnnLz87v0oEnrL3NfOaAF7dbdTGCaekgK_lxYro_-9Z0s03ZLA7y4H3RU9fB49VEGtqFtAahGlz_gwm5u7Q

Location.description:
The Location response header indicates the URL of OpenID Provider OP service to redirect the web view of the Wallet Instance to.

This URL present in query string:
  • scope
  • code_challenge
  • code_challenge_method
  • request (a signed JWT containing the Authorization Request signed by the RP)

200.description:
Ok

BINDING HTTP-POST, according to Section 4.3.3 of the JWT Secured Authorization Response Mode for OAuth 2.0 specification

request parameter of the HTML form contains all the claims required to invoke the athorization endpoint of OpenID Provider:
JWT EXAMPLE ON JWT.IO

get.summary: The RP OIDC endpoint for forwarding authenticated user data to the /callback endpoint of the Authorization Server endpoint

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Contains the unique application session identifier at the Wallet Instance side

parameters.name: rp_user_session
parameters.description: Contains the unique user session identifier at the RP side

302.description:
Found

No content

BINDING HTTP-REDIRECT

=> EXAMPLE Location Header:

https%3A%2F%2Fstart.wallet.example.org%3Fcode%3DSplxlOBeZQQYbYS6WxSbIA%26state%3DfyZiOL9Lf2CeKuNT2JzxiLRDink0uPcd%26iss%3DAxjAnj0t5qpRVgR6apZ7gChaPb6y8gNm7CkPd58PD4c

Location.description:
The Location response header indicates the URL to redirect the Wallet Instance.

This URL present in query string:
  • code (the authorization code generated by the Authorization Server)
  • state
  • iss

200.description:
Ok

BINDING HTTP-POST, according to Section 4.3.3 of the JWT Secured Authorization Response Mode for OAuth 2.0 specification

EXAMPLE JWT included inside the 'response' parameter of the HTML form that contains the authorization code generated by the authorization server (claim 'code') and the same 'state' and 'iss' parameters were present in the PAR Request (in URL-encoded format).
